files.description: Task runner script that executes (1) taxonomy smoke-test, (2) toy demo run, (3) artifact gate in a fixed order, streams output to console, writes per-step logs under runtime/_build/logs/, and exits non-zero on the first failure.

missionDescription: Build a `run_all.py` (or Makefile/task runner) that executes in a fixed order: (1) taxonomy smoke-test, (2) toy demo run, (3) artifact gate; ensure it writes logs to `runtime/_build/logs/` and exits non-zero on any failure.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
